nodes.text: Balluzikik was a male Barabel bounty hunter and the mate of Slizzik. He was part of the bounty hunter crew formed by the Taloron Hunter Crutag that chased a team of Alliance to Restore the Republic operatives to the planet Trinta. While on the planet, the Dark Jedi Halagad Ventor used the Force to scare Balluzikik to death.
